title: Boston National Historical Park: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        Are you looking to be more involved with Boston National Historical Park?  The park offers volunteer opportunities, for everything from staffing visitor centers, maintaining a World War II era destroyer, and administrative duties.  Volunteering is fun, makes a difference, allows you to meet new people, and give back to the community!  If you're interested in volunteering at Boston National Historical Park, visit the Volunteers page.
